title: The.Deep.1977.1080p.BluRay.10Bit.HEVC.EAC3-SARTRE
description: Peter Benchley, who wrote Jaws, also wrote The Deep. Scuba divers David Sanders and Gail Berke (Nick Nolte and Jacqueline Bisset), assisted by Romer Treece (Robert Shaw), discover a sunken treasure off the Bermuda coast. They also find a stash of narcotics. David and Gail spend the rest of the picture avoiding bad guys who stashed the drugs and want the treasure as well. STARS.........: Jacqueline Bisset, Nick Nolte, Robert Shaw DIRECTOR......: Peter Yates WRITERS.......: Peter Benchley, Tracy Keenan Wynn GENRE.........: Adventure, Mystery, Thriller IMDB RATING...: 6.2/10 8,993 votes IMDB LINK.....: https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0075925 RUNTIME.......: 2h 4mn SIZE..........: 3.93 GB VIDEO CODEC...: HEVC ([email protected]) RESOLUTION....: 1920x800 ASPECT RATIO..: 2.40:1 BITRATE.......: 4000 Kbps (2-pass) FRAMERATE.....: 23.976 fps AUDIO.........: Dolby Digital Plus 5.1 512kbps SUBTITLES.....: ENG, FIN, ITA, NOR, POR, SPA, SWE CHAPTERS......: Yes SOURCE........: Blu Ray ENCODED BY....: Sartre ENCODE DATE...: 2017-06-05 Extras • The Making of 'The Deep' - A comprehensive vintage piece, narrated by star Robert Shaw, that looks at the "danger, challenge, excitement, and fear" of making an aquatic-based film. Topics include the number of dives required to make the film, shooting underwater and with real derelict ships, the danger of natural predators to the cast and crew, the performances and professionalism of the cast, filming some of the dangerous stunts, and much more. The piece also contains plenty of archival and behind-the-scenes footage and cast and crew interview clips. (720p, ENG/ITA/SPA subtitles, 48:40) • Selected Scenes From the 3 Hour Special Edition - Romer Treece's Disposition (0:59), Treece and David Harassed by Cloche's Goons (2:05), Pillow Talk (6:15), Extended Conversation Between Cloche and Treece (3:15), Treece's Past Revealed (5:14), and Prologue: The 'Goliath' Sinks (3:02). (720p, ENG/ITA/SPA subtitles)
